Module com.example.project
Package javafxUI

Class Checking

java.lang.Object
javafxUI.Account
javafxUI.Checking
Direct Known Subclasses:
CollegeChecking
public class Checking extends Account
Checking class is the extension of Account class. It contains the data and specific operations needed to run a checking account.
Author:
Sumanth Rajkumar, Shantanu Jain

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object obj)
      Checks if the passed in object is an instance of Checking or not, overrides method in Account class.
      Overrides:
      equals in class Account
      Parameters:

      Returns:

      Returns:
      - double representing the annual interest

    • monthlyInterest

      public double monthlyInterest()
      This function returns a monthly interest, which in this case would be balance*annualInterest/1200, overrides method from Account class.
      Specified by:
      monthlyInterest in class Account
      Returns:
      - double representing the monthly interest that an account holder gets on his account.

    • fee

      public double fee()
      This function returns a monthly fee that an account holder needs to pay on a monthly basis, overrides method from Account class.
      Specified by:
      fee in class Account
      Returns:
      - a double representing a monthly fee that an account holder needs to pay on a monthly basis depending on the balance.

      toString in class Account
